Class PermissionsDTS

    • getAllRows

      public List<PermissionsDAO> getAllRows() throws NoRowsFoundException, org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
      Retrieves all entries from the "permissions" table.
      Returns:
      The list of all entries from the "permissions" table.
      Throws:
      NoRowsFoundException - There were no entries found in the "permissions" table.
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - See message for reason for exception.

    • search

      public List<PermissionsDAO> search​(String column, String query) throws NoRowsFoundException, org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
      Searches for "PermissionsDAO" entries in the requested column for the query in the "permissions" table.
      Parameters:
      column - - The column to search for the query in.
      query - - The value to search in the column for.
      Returns:
      A list of "PermissionsDAO" entries that meet the requested criteria.
      Throws:
      NoRowsFoundException - There were no "PermissionsDAO" entries found in the "permissions" table.
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - See message for reason for exception.

    • create

      public boolean create​(PermissionsDAO entry) throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
      Adds the inputed "PermissionsDAO" to the "permissions" table.
      Parameters:
      entry - - The "PermissionsDAO" to add to the "permissions" table.
      Returns:
      Status of creation. True: "PermissionsDAO" was added to the "permissions" table. False: "PermissionsDAO" was NOT added to the database.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - An issue occurred, "PermissionsDAO" was not added to the "permissions".

    • delete

      public boolean delete​(PermissionsDAO entry) throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
      removes the inputed "PermissionsDAO" from the "permissions" table.
      Parameters:
      entry - - The "PermissionsDAO" to remove from the "permissions" table.
      Returns:
      Status of deletion. True: "PermissionsDAO" was deleted to the "permissions" table. False: "PermissionsDAO" was NOT deleted to the database.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - An issue occurred, "PermissionsDAO" was not deleted to the "permissions".

    • update

      public boolean update​(PermissionsDAO entry) throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
      Updates the "PermissionsDAO" in the "permissions" table using the "PermissionsDAO" id's.
      Parameters:
      user - - The "PermissionsDAO" to update the database with.
      Returns:
      Status of update. True: "PermissionsDAO" was updated. False: "PermissionsDAO" was NOT updated.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - An issue occurred, "PermissionsDAO" was not updated.
